attributes.action: lower membership fees of all political parties in the uk in a recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like the pm to ask political parties to lower membership fees for all members whether employed or unemployed or student.

this would encourage ppl to take part thanks to more interest in politics due election of obama. 

please can you reduce membership prices for unemployed and students to encourage ppl to join and change people's lives for the better.
